00137         public function get_countries()
00138         {
00139                 $query = "SELECT id, name FROM countries";
00140         $result = self::$db->query($query);
00141         while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00142                 foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00143                         //$this->_countries[$key][] = $value;
00144                                 $this->_countries[$key][$row['id']] = htmlentities($value);
00145         mysqli_free_result($result);
00146 
00147         return $this->_countries;
00148         }

00391         public function get_all_resources($page, $filters = array())
00392         {
00393                 $resources = array();
00394                 if($page == "edit")
00395                         $query = "SELECT id, name, creation_date, modification_date FROM observatories ORDER BY modification_date DESC";
00396                 elseif($page == "browse")
00397                 {
00398                         $query = "SELECT id, name, institution, web_address, " .
00399                         "country_id, email FROM observatories"; 
00400                         
00402                         $filter_string = implode('', $filters); 
00403                         if(!empty($filter_string))
00404                                 $query .= " WHERE ";
00405                                 
00406                         //DEBUG:
00407                         //echo "Filter for Country:" . $filters["country"];
00408                         //nl();
00409                         //echo "Filter for Telescope Type:" . $filters["telescope_type"];
00410                         //nl();
00411                         
00412                         $filter_queries = array();
00413                                 
00414                         if(!empty($filters["country"]))
00415                                 //$query .= "country_id=". $filters["country"]; 
00416                                 $filter_queries[] = "country_id=". $filters["country"];
00417                                 
00419                         //if(!empty($filters["country"]) && !empty($filters["telescope_type"]))
00420                         //      $query .= " AND ";
00421                                 
00422                         if(!empty($filters["telescope_type"]))
00423                         {
00424                                 //$query .= "id IN (SELECT observatory_id FROM observatory_to_telescopes WHERE telescope_id IN ";
00425                                 //$query .= "(SELECT id FROM telescopes WHERE telescope_type=" . $filters["telescope_type"] . "))";     
00426                                 $filter_queries[] = "id IN (SELECT observatory_id FROM observatory_to_telescopes WHERE telescope_id IN " . 
00427                                         "(SELECT id FROM telescopes WHERE telescope_type=" . $filters["telescope_type"] . "))";         
00428                         }
00429                         
00430                         if(!empty($filters["research_area"]))
00431                         {
00432                                 $filter_queries[] = "id IN (SELECT observatory_id FROM observatory_to_research_areas WHERE " .
00433                                 "research_area_id=" . $filters["research_area"] . ")";
00434                         }
00435                         
00436                         if(!empty($filters["target"]))
00437                         {
00438                                 $filter_queries[] = "id IN (SELECT observatory_id FROM observatory_to_targets WHERE " .
00439                                 "target_id=" . $filters["target"] . ")";
00440                         }
00441                                                         
00443                         $query .= implode(" AND ", $filter_queries);
00444                         
00445                         $query .= " ORDER BY observatories.name";
00446                         
00447                         //DEBUG:
00448                         //echo $query;
00449                         //nl();
00450                 }
00451                         
00452 
00453                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00454                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00455                 {
00456                         $resources[$row["id"]] = $row;
00457                         if($page == "browse")
00458                         {
00459                                 $query2 = "SELECT name FROM countries WHERE id=" . $row["country_id"];
00460                                 $result2 = self::$db->query($query2);
00461                                 $row2 = mysqli_fetch_array($result2, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00462                                 $resources[$row["id"]]["country"] = htmlentities($row2["name"]);
00463                                 mysqli_free_result($result2);
00464 
00465                                 //Hidden Fields
00466                                 $query2 = "SELECT web_address, email FROM hidden_fields WHERE id=" . $row["id"];
00467                                 $result2 = self::$db->query($query2);
00468                                 $row2 = mysqli_fetch_array($result2, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00469                                 $resources[$row["id"]]["hide_web_address"] = $row2["web_address"];
00470                                 $resources[$row["id"]]["hide_email"] = $row2["email"];
00471                                 mysqli_free_result($result2);
00472 
00473                                 //Telescope Types
00474                                 $resources[$row["id"]]["telescope_types"] = array();
00475                                 $resources[$row["id"]]["wavelengths"] = array();
00476                                 $query2 = "SELECT telescope_id FROM observatory_to_telescopes WHERE observatory_id=" . $row["id"];
00477                                 $result2 = self::$db->query($query2);
00478                                 while ($row2 = mysqli_fetch_array($result2, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00479                                 {
00480                                         $query3 = "SELECT telescope_type, wavelength FROM telescopes WHERE id=" . $row2["telescope_id"];
00481                                         $result3 = self::$db->query($query3);
00482                                         $row3 = mysqli_fetch_array($result3, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00483                                         $telescope_type_id = $row3["telescope_type"];
00484                                         $resources[$row["id"]]["wavelengths"][] = htmlentities($row3["wavelength"]);
00485                                         mysqli_free_result($result3);
00486 
00487                                         $query3 = "SELECT name FROM telescope_types WHERE id=" . $telescope_type_id;
00488                                         $result3 = self::$db->query($query3);
00489                                         $row3 = mysqli_fetch_array($result3, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00490                                         $resources[$row["id"]]["telescope_types"][] = htmlentities($row3["name"]);
00491                                         mysqli_free_result($result3);
00492                                 }
00493                                 mysqli_free_result($result2);
00494                         }
00495                 }
00496                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00497 
00498                 return $resources;
00499         }

00501 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00510         public function get_resource($resource_id) {
00511                 $query = "SELECT * FROM observatories WHERE id=" . $resource_id;
00512         $result = self::$db->query($query);
00513         $res = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC)
00514                 or die("<br>Error: No such Resource existing!</b>");
00515         mysqli_free_result($result);
00516 
00517                 //OBSERVATORIES TABLE
00518                 foreach ($res as $key => $value)
00519                 {
00520                         //check if value is 0 since we use INT in the DB
00521                         if($value != '0')
00522                         {
00523                                 if($key == 'latitude')
00524                                         $this->floatToGps($key, stripslashes($value));
00525                                 elseif($key == 'longitude')
00526                                         $this->floatToGps($key, stripslashes($value));
00527                                 else
00528                                         $this->_fields["obs_$key"] = stripslashes($value);
00529                         }
00530                         else
00531                                 $this->_fields["obs_$key"] = '';
00532                 }
00533 
00534                 //SCIENTIFIC CONTACTS
00535                 $query = "SELECT id, name, email, institution FROM scientific_contacts, observatory_to_scientific_contacts " .
00536                 "WHERE scientific_contacts.id=observatory_to_scientific_contacts.scientific_contact_id " .
00537                 "AND observatory_to_scientific_contacts.observatory_id=" . $resource_id;
00538                 //DEBUG:
00539                 //echo $query;
00540                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00541                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00542                 {
00543                         foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00544                         {
00545                                 if ($key == 'id')
00546                                         $this->_hasMany["scientific_contacts"][] = $value;
00547                                 else
00548                                         $this->_scientificContacts["sci_con_$key"][] = stripslashes($value);
00549                         }
00550                 }
00551                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00552 
00553                 //HIDDENFIELDS
00554                 $query = "SELECT * FROM hidden_fields WHERE hidden_fields.id=" . $resource_id;
00555                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00556                 $row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00558                 foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00559                 {
00560                         //check if key is not ID, we do not need that
00561                         if($key != 'id')
00562                                 $this->_hiddenFields[$key] = $value;
00563                 }
00564                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00565 
00566                 //RESEARCH AREAS
00567                 $query = "SELECT research_area_id as research_areas FROM observatory_to_research_areas " .
00568                 "WHERE observatory_to_research_areas.observatory_id=" . $resource_id;
00569                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00570                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00571                 {
00572                         foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00573                                 $this->_hasMany[$key][] = $value;
00574                 }
00575                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00576 
00577                 //TARGETS
00578                 $query = "SELECT target_id as targets FROM observatory_to_targets " .
00579                 "WHERE observatory_to_targets.observatory_id=" . $resource_id;
00580                 //DEBUG:
00581                 //echo $query;
00582                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00583                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00584                 {
00585                         foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00586                                 $this->_hasMany[$key][] = $value;
00587 
00588                 }
00589                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00590 
00591                 //TELESCOPES
00592                 //SIMILAR QUERY TO SCIENTIFIC CONTACTS
00593                 $query = "SELECT * FROM telescopes, observatory_to_telescopes " .
00594                 "WHERE telescopes.id=observatory_to_telescopes.telescope_id " .
00595                 "AND observatory_to_telescopes.observatory_id=" . $resource_id;
00596                 //echo "TESTING INSTRUMENT QUERY: " . $query . "<br>";
00597 
00598                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00599 
00600                 while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00601                 {
00602                         //for each telescope of the requested obervatory
00603                         foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00604                         {
00605                                 //check if value is 0 since we use FLOAT in the DB
00606                                 if($value != '0')
00607                                 {
00608                                         if($key == 'id')
00609                                         {
00610                                                 //save telescope id in telescopes
00611                                                 //DEBUG
00612                                                 //echo "TELESCOPE ID: " . $value . "<br>";
00613                                                 $this->_hasMany["telescopes"][] = $value;
00614                                                 //$this->_hasMany["instruments"][$value] = array();
00615 
00616                                                 //get all instruments for current telescope
00617                                                 $query_1 = "SELECT * FROM instruments, telescope_to_instruments " .
00618                                                 "WHERE instruments.id=telescope_to_instruments.instrument_id " .
00619                                                 "AND telescope_to_instruments.telescope_id=" . $value;
00620 
00621                                                 //DEBUG
00622                                                 //echo $query_1 . "<br>";
00623 
00624                                                 $result_1 = self::$db->query($query_1);
00625                                                 while($row_1 = mysqli_fetch_array($result_1, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00626                                                 {
00627                                                         //for each instrument of the requested telescopes
00628                                                         foreach($row_1 as $i_key => $i_value)
00629                                                         {
00630                                                                 //check if value is 0 since we use FLOAT in the DB
00631                                                                 if($i_value != '0')
00632                                                                 {
00633                                                                         if($i_key == 'id')
00634                                                                         {
00635                                                                                 //DEBUG
00636                                                                                 //echo "TELESCOPE ID: " . $value . "=> INSTRUMENT ID: " . $i_value . "<br>";
00637                                                                                 $this->_hasMany["instruments"][$value][] = $i_value;
00638                                                                         }
00639                                                                         else
00640                                                                                 $this->_instruments[$i_key][$value][] = stripslashes($i_value);
00641 
00642                                                                         //echo $i_key . ": ";
00643                                                                         //echo $i_value . "<br>";
00644                                                                 }
00645                                                                 else
00646                                                                         $this->_instruments[$i_key][$value][] = '';
00647                                                         }
00648                                                 }
00649                                                 mysqli_free_result($result_1);
00650                                         }
00651                                         else
00652                                                 $this->_telescopes[$key][] = stripslashes($value);
00653                                 }
00654                                 else
00655                                         $this->_telescopes[$key][] = '';
00656                         }
00657                 }
00658                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00659 
00660                 //ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
00661                 $query = "SELECT * FROM additional_information WHERE additional_information.id=" . $resource_id;
00662                 //DEBUG:
00663                 //echo $query;
00664                 $result = self::$db->query($query);
00665                 $row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC);
00666                 foreach ($row as $key => $value)
00667                 {
00668                         //check if key is not ID, we do not need that
00669                         if($key != 'id')
00670                                 $this->_additionalInformation[$key] = stripslashes($value);
00671                 }
00672                 mysqli_free_result($result);
00673 
00674         }

00686         public function get_old_resource($resource_id) {
00687 
00688                 //OLD NA1 - maintable Table:
00689                 $query = "SELECT * FROM maintable WHERE id=" . $resource_id;
00690         $result = self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
00691         $res = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC)
00692                 or die("<br>Error: No such Resource existing!</b>");
00693         mysqli_free_result($result);
00694 
00695         foreach ($res as $key => $value)
00696                 {
00697                         if($key == "Name")
00698                                 $this->_fields["obs_name"] = $value;
00699                         if($key == "Founded")
00700                                 $this->_fields["obs_founded"] = $value;
00701                         if($key == "Institution")
00702                                 $this->_fields["obs_institution"] = $value;
00703                         if($key == "URL")
00704                                 $this->_fields["obs_web_address"] = $value;
00705                         if($key == "Country") // NO 100% match guaranteed! => as text to approx_position
00706                                 $this->_fields["obs_approx_position"] = $value;
00707                         if($key == "Address")
00708                                 $this->_fields["obs_address"] = $value;
00709                         if($key == "Phone")
00710                                 $this->_fields["obs_phone"] = $value;
00711                         if($key == "email")
00712                                 $this->_fields["obs_email"] = $value;
00713                         if($key == "Sciencecontactname")
00714                                 $this->_scientificContacts["sci_con_name"][] = stripslashes($value);
00715                         if($key == "Sciencecontactnemail")
00716                                 $this->_scientificContacts["sci_con_email"][] = stripslashes($value);
00717                         if($key == "Institution")
00718                                 $this->_scientificContacts["sci_con_institution"][] = stripslashes($value);
00719                         if($key == "latitude")// NO 100% match guaranteed! => as text to approx_position
00720                                 $this->_fields["obs_approx_position"] .= "; LAT:" . stripslashes($value);
00721                         if($key == "longitude")// NO 100% match guaranteed! => as text to approx_position
00722                                 $this->_fields["obs_approx_position"] .= "; LON:" . stripslashes($value);
00723                         if($key == "meters")
00724                                 $this->_fields["obs_sealevel_m"] = $value;
00725                         if($key == "precipitation")
00726                                 $this->_fields["obs_approx_position"] .= "; Rain:" . stripslashes($value);
00727                         if($key == "clearnights")
00728                                 $this->_fields["obs_approx_position"] .= "; Nights:" . stripslashes($value);
00729                         if($key == "timezone")
00730                         {
00731                                 if($value >= 0)
00732                                         $value += 1;
00733                                 else
00734                                         $value = (($value * -1) + 13);
00735                                 $this->_fields["obs_timezone"] = $value;
00736                         }
00737                         if($key == "partners")
00738                                 $this->_fields["obs_partner_observatories"] = stripslashes($value);
00739                         if($key == "comments")
00740                                 $this->_additionalInformation["general_comments"] = stripslashes($value);
00741                         if($key == "oid")
00742                                 $obsId = stripslashes($value);
00743                 }
00744 
00745                 //OLD NA1 - instruments Table
00746                 $query = "SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE oid=" . $obsId;
00747         $result = self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
00748         $res = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC)
00749                 or die("<br>Error: No such Resource existing!</b>");
00750         mysqli_free_result($result);
00751 
00752         $maxTelescopeNumber = 0;
00753         foreach ($res as $key => $value)
00754                 {
00755                         $counter = 0;
00756                         if($key == "instrument")
00757                         {
00758                                 $str = explode("<br>", $value);
00759                                 foreach($str as $strValue)
00760                                 {
00761                                         $this->_telescopes["telescope_name"][] = stripslashes($strValue);
00762                                         $counter++;
00763                                 }
00764                         }
00765                         if($key == "type")
00766                         {
00767                                 $str = explode("<br>", $value);
00768                                 foreach($str as $strValue)
00769                                 {
00770                                         $this->_telescopes["comments"][] = "TelType: " . stripslashes($strValue) . LF;
00771                                         $counter++;
00772                                 }
00773                         }
00774                         if($key == "diameter")
00775                         {
00776                                 $str = explode("<br>", $value);
00777                                 foreach($str as $strValue)
00778                                 {
00779                                         $this->_telescopes["diameter_m"][] = floatval($strValue);
00780                                         $counter++;
00781                                 }
00782                         }
00783                         if($key == "focallength")
00784                         {
00785                                 $str = explode("<br>", $value);
00786                                 foreach($str as $strValue)
00787                                 {
00788                                         $this->_telescopes["focallength_m"][] = stripslashes($strValue);
00789                                         $counter++;
00790                                 }
00791                         }
00792 
00793                         if($counter > $maxTelescopeNumber)
00794                                 $maxTelescopeNumber = $counter;
00795                 }
00796                 while($maxTelescopeNumber--)
00797                         $this->_hasMany["telescopes"][] = ""; //FIXMEE
00798 
00799                 //OLD NA1 - extrainstruments Table
00800                 $query = "SELECT * FROM extrainstruments WHERE oid=" . $obsId;
00801         $result = self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
00802         $res = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC)
00803                 or die("<br>Error: No such Resource existing!</b>");
00804         mysqli_free_result($result);
00805 
00806         foreach ($res as $key => $value)
00807                 {
00808                         if($key == "furthurcommentsins")
00809                                 $this->_telescopes["comments"][0] .=  stripslashes($strValue) . LF;
00810 
00811                         if($key == "additionalcommentsins")
00812                                 $this->_additionalInformation["additional_instruments"] = stripslashes($value);
00813 
00814                         if($key == "arraydesc")
00815                                 $this->_additionalInformation["array_description"] = stripslashes($value);
00816 
00817                         if($key == "backenddesc")
00818                                 $this->_additionalInformation["backend_description"] = stripslashes($value);
00819                 }
00820 
00821                 //OLD NA1 - contact Table
00822                 $query = "SELECT * FROM contact WHERE oid=" . $obsId;
00823         $result = self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
00824         $res = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC)
00825                 or die("<br>Error: No such Resource existing!</b>");
00826         mysqli_free_result($result);
00827 
00828         foreach ($res as $key => $value)
00829                 {
00830                         if($key == "FurthurContact")
00831                                 $this->_additionalInformation["further_contacts"] = stripslashes($value);
00832 
00833                         if($key == "contactdata")
00834                         {
00835                                 $this->_hiddenFields["address"] = $value;
00836                                 $this->_hiddenFields["further_contacts"] = $value;
00837                                 $this->_hiddenFields["city"] = $value;
00838                         }
00839 
00840                         if($key == "emailaddress")
00841                                 $this->_hiddenFields["email"] = $value;
00842 
00843                         if($key == "phonenumber")
00844                                 $this->_hiddenFields["phone"] = $value;
00845 
00846                         if($key == "postalcode")
00847                                 $this->_hiddenFields["zip_code"] = $value;
00848 
00849                         if($key == "url")
00850                                 $this->_hiddenFields["web_address"] = $value;
00851 
00852                         if($key == "sc")
00853                                 $this->_hiddenFields["scientific_contacts"] = $value;
00854 
00855                         if($key == "gc")
00856                         {
00857                                 $this->_hiddenFields["latitude"] = $value;
00858                                 $this->_hiddenFields["longitude"] = $value;
00859                         }
00860                 }
00861 
00862                 //OLD NA1 - areaofresearch Table
00863                 $query = "SELECT * FROM areasofresearch WHERE oid=" . $obsId;
00864         $result = self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
00865         $res = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC)
00866                 or die("<br>Error: No such Resource existing!</b>");
00867         mysqli_free_result($result);
00868 
00869         foreach($res as $key => $value)
00870         {
00871                         if($key == "keyresearch")
00872                                 $this->_additionalInformation["research_comments"] = stripslashes($value) . LF;
00873 
00874                         if($key == "extraresearch")
00875                                 $this->_additionalInformation["research_comments"] .= stripslashes($value) . LF;
00876 
00877                         if($key == "comments")
00878                                 $this->_additionalInformation["research_comments"] .= stripslashes($value);
00879         }
00880 
00881                 //OLD NA1 - hiddenfields Table
00882                 $query = "SELECT * FROM hiddenfields WHERE oid=" . $obsId;
00883         $result = self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
00884         $res = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC)
00885                 or die("<br>Error: No such Resource existing!</b>");
00886         mysqli_free_result($result);
00887 
00888         foreach($res as $key => $value)
00889         {
00890                         if($key == "Contact")
00891                                 $this->_additionalInformation["further_contacts"] = stripslashes($value) . LF . $this->_additionalInformation["further_contacts"];
00892 
00893                         if($key == "email")
00894                                 $this->_additionalInformation["further_contacts"] .= stripslashes($value) . LF;
00895 
00896                         if($key == "phone")
00897                                 if(isset($this->_fields["obs_phone"]))
00898                                         $this->_additionalInformation["further_contacts"] .= "Phone: " . stripslashes($value) . LF;
00899                                 else
00900                                         $this->_fields["obs_phone"] = stripslashes($value);
00901 
00902                         if($key == "zip")
00903                                 $this->_fields["obs_zip_code"] = stripslashes($value);
00904 
00905                         if($key == "url")
00906                                 if(isset($this->_fields["obs_web_address"]))
00907                                         $this->_additionalInformation["further_contacts"] .= "Url: " . stripslashes($value) . LF;
00908                                 else
00909                                         $this->_fields["obs_web_address"] = stripslashes($value);
00910 
00911                         if($key == "sciconname")
00912                                 $this->_additionalInformation["further_contacts"] .= stripslashes($value) . " - ";
00913                         if($key == "sciconcon")
00914                                 $this->_additionalInformation["further_contacts"] .= stripslashes($value) . LF;
00915 
00916                         if($key == "latitude")
00917                                 $this->_additionalInformation["further_contacts"] .= "Latitude: " . stripslashes($value) . " - ";
00918                         if($key == "longitude")
00919                                 $this->_additionalInformation["further_contacts"] .= "Longitude: " . stripslashes($value);
00920         }
00921 
00922         }

00933         public function add_resource() {
00934                 //convert GPS to FLOAT first
00935         $latitude_float = $this->gpsToFloat($_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["prefix"],
00936                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["degree"],
00937                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["minutes"],
00938                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["seconds"],
00939                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["cent"]);
00940 
00941         $longitude_float = $this->gpsToFloat($_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["prefix"],
00942                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["degree"],
00943                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["minutes"],
00944                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["seconds"],
00945                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["cent"]);
00946 
00947                 $query = "INSERT INTO observatories (" .
00948                         "`id`,`name`,`founded`,`institution`,`web_address`,`address`,`zip_code`," .
00949                         "`city`,`country_id`,`phone`,`email`,`latitude`,`longitude`,`approx_position`," .
00950                         "`sealevel_m`,`precipitation`,`clear_nights`,`timezone`," .
00951                         "`observatory_status`," .
00952                         "`partner_observatories`, `creation_date`)" .
00953                         "VALUES (NULL,'" .
00954                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_name"]) . "','" .
00955                 $_POST["add_obs_founded"] . "','" .
00956                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_institution"]) . "','" .
00957                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_web_address"]) . "','" .
00958                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_address"]) . "','" .
00959                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_zip_code"]) . "','" .
00960                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_city"]) . "','" .
00961                 $_POST["add_obs_country_id"] . "','" .
00962                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_phone"]) . "','" .
00963                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_email"]) . "','" .
00964                 addslashes($latitude_float) . "','" .
00965                 addslashes($longitude_float) . "','" .
00966                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_position"]) . "','" .
00967                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sealevel"]) . "','" .
00968                 $_POST["add_obs_precip_id"] . "','" .
00969                 $_POST["add_obs_clearnights_id"] . "','" .
00970                 $_POST["add_obs_timezone_id"] . "','" .
00971                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_status"]) . "','" .
00972                 addslashes($_POST["add_obs_partner"]) . "'," .
00973                 "NOW())";
00974 
00975         //print "Debug: " . $query;
00976 
00977                 self::$db->query($query);
00978                 $status = array("errno" => self::$db->errno(),
00979                         "error" => self::$db->error(),
00980                         "res_id" => self::$db->getLastInsertId());
00981 
00982                 return $status;
00983         }

00996         public function update_resource($res_id) {
00997                 //convert GPS to FLOAT first
00998                 $latitude_float = $this->gpsToFloat($_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["prefix"],
00999                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["degree"],
01000                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["minutes"],
01001                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["seconds"],
01002                                                        $_POST["add_obs_latitude"]["cent"]);
01003 
01004         $longitude_float = $this->gpsToFloat($_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["prefix"],
01005                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["degree"],
01006                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["minutes"],
01007                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["seconds"],
01008                                                         $_POST["add_obs_longitude"]["cent"]);
01009 
01010                 $query = "UPDATE observatories SET " .
01011                         //We get another POST VAR for the name if EDIT
01012                         "name='" . addslashes($_POST["update_obs_name"]) . "'," .
01013                         "founded='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_founded"]) . "'," .
01014                         "institution='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_institution"]) . "'," .
01015                         "web_address='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_web_address"]) . "'," .
01016                         "address='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_address"]) . "'," .
01017                         "zip_code='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_zip_code"]) . "'," .
01018                         "city='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_city"]) . "'," .
01019                         "country_id='" . $_POST["add_obs_country_id"] . "'," .
01020                         "phone='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_phone"]) . "'," .
01021                         "email='" .addslashes($_POST["add_obs_email"]) . "'," .
01022                         "latitude='" . addslashes($latitude_float) . "'," .
01023                         "longitude='" . addslashes($longitude_float) . "'," .
01024                         "approx_position='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_position"]) . "'," .
01025                         "sealevel_m='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sealevel"]) . "'," .
01026                         "precipitation='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_precip_id"]) . "'," .
01027                         "clear_nights='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_clearnights_id"]) . "'," .
01028                         "timezone='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_timezone_id"]) . "'," .
01029                         "observatory_status='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_status"]) . "'," .
01030                         "partner_observatories='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_partner"]) . "'," .
01031                         "modification_date=NOW() " .
01032                         "WHERE id=" . $res_id;
01033 
01034                 self::$db->query($query);
01035                 $status = array("errno" => self::$db->errno(),
01036                         "error" => self::$db->error(),
01037                         "res_id" => $res_id);
01038 
01039                 return $status;
01040         }

01042 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01053         public function del_resource($resource_id)
01054         {
01055                 //DELETING instruments
01056                 $query = "DELETE FROM instruments WHERE EXISTS " .
01057                                  "(SELECT telescope_to_instruments.telescope_id FROM telescope_to_instruments, observatory_to_telescopes WHERE " .
01058                                  "telescope_to_instruments.instrument_id = instruments.id AND " .
01059                                  "observatory_to_telescopes.telescope_id = telescope_to_instruments.telescope_id AND " .
01060                                  "observatory_to_telescopes.observatory_id = " . $resource_id . ");";
01061                 self::$db->query($query);
01062 
01063                 //DELETING scientific contacts
01064                 $query = "DELETE FROM scientific_contacts WHERE EXISTS " .
01065                                  "(SELECT observatory_to_scientific_contacts.observatory_id FROM observatory_to_scientific_contacts WHERE " .
01066                                  "observatory_to_scientific_contacts.scientific_contact_id = scientific_contacts.id AND " .
01067                                  "observatory_to_scientific_contacts.observatory_id = " . $resource_id . ");";
01068                 self::$db->query($query);
01069 
01070                 //DELETING telescopes
01071                 $query = "DELETE FROM telescopes WHERE EXISTS " .
01072                                  "(SELECT observatory_to_telescopes.observatory_id FROM observatory_to_telescopes WHERE " .
01073                                  "observatory_to_telescopes.telescope_id = telescopes.id AND " .
01074                                  "observatory_to_telescopes.observatory_id = " . $resource_id . ");";
01075                 self::$db->query($query);
01076 
01077                 //DELETING observatory
01078                 $query = "DELETE FROM observatories WHERE id=" . $resource_id;
01079                 self::$db->query($query);
01080 
01081                 $status = array("errno" => self::$db->errno(),
01082                         "error" => self::$db->error(),
01083                         "resource_id" => $resource_id);
01084 
01085                 return $status;
01086         }

01099         public function del_old_resource($resource_id)
01100         {
01101                 // Get oid of OLD NA1 Obs resource
01102                 $query = "SELECT oid FROM maintable WHERE id=" . $resource_id;
01103         $result = self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
01104         $res = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC)
01105                 or die("<br>Error: No such Resource existing!</b>");
01106         mysqli_free_result($result);
01107 
01108         foreach($res as $key => $value)
01109                 if($key == "oid")
01110                         $obsId = $value;
01111 
01112                 // Delete areaofresearch Table entry
01113                 $query = "DELETE FROM areasofresearch WHERE areasofresearch.oid=" . $obsId . ";";
01114                 self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
01115 
01116                 // Delete contact Table entry
01117                 $query = "DELETE FROM contact WHERE contact.oid=" . $obsId . ";";
01118                 self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
01119 
01120                 // Delete extrainstruments Table entry
01121                 $query = "DELETE FROM extrainstruments WHERE extrainstruments.oid=" . $obsId . ";";
01122                 self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
01123 
01124                 // Delete hiddenfields Table entry
01125                 $query = "DELETE FROM hiddenfields WHERE hiddenfields.oid=" . $obsId . ";";
01126                 self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
01127 
01128                 // Delete instruments Table entry
01129                 $query = "DELETE FROM instruments WHERE instruments.oid=" . $obsId . ";";
01130                 self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
01131 
01132                 // Delete maintable Table entry
01133                 $query = "DELETE FROM maintable WHERE maintable.oid=" . $obsId . ";";
01134                 self::$dbOldObs->query($query);
01135 
01136                 $status = array("errno" => self::$dbOldObs->errno(),
01137                         "error" => self::$dbOldObs->error(),
01138                         "resource_id" => $resource_id);
01139 
01140                 return $status;
01141         }

01143 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01154         public function add_obs_keys($res_id, $action)
01155         {
01156                 //------------------------------------------------------------
01157                 //ADD/UPD/DEL (observatory_to_scientific_contacts & scientific_contacts)
01158                 //called VIA EDIT
01159                 if ($action == "Update Entry")
01160                         $this->update_sci_cons($res_id);
01161             //called VIA ADD/EDIT
01162                 $this->add_sci_cons($res_id);
01163 
01164                 //------------------------------------------------------------
01165                 //ADD/UPD/DEL (hidden_fields)
01166                 if ($action == "Update Entry")
01167                 $this->update_hidden_fields($res_id);
01168             //called VIA ADD
01169             if ($action == "Add Entry")
01170                 $this->add_hidden_fields($res_id);
01171 
01172             //------------------------------------------------------------
01173             //ADD/UPD/DEL (observatory_to_research_areas & research_areas)
01174             //called via EDIT
01175             if ($action == "Update Entry")
01176                 $this->delete_res_areas($res_id);
01177             //called VIA ADD/EDIT
01178             $this->add_res_areas($res_id);
01179 
01180             //------------------------------------------------------------
01181             //ADD/UPD/DEL (observatory_to_targets)
01182             //called via EDIT
01183             if ($action == "Update Entry")
01184                 $this->delete_targets($res_id);
01185             //called VIA ADD/EDIT
01186             $this->add_targets($res_id);
01187 
01188                 //------------------------------------------------------------
01189             //ADD/UPD/DEL (observatories_to_telescopes & telescopes)
01190             //called via EDIT
01191             if ($action == "Update Entry")
01192                         $this->delete_telescopes($res_id);
01193                 //called VIA ADD/EDIT
01194                 $this->add_telescopes($res_id);
01195 
01196             //------------------------------------------------------------
01197             //ADD/UPD/DEL (additional_information)
01198                 //called via EDIT
01199             if ($action == "Update Entry")
01200                 $this->update_add_info($res_id);
01201             //called VIA ADD
01202             if ($action == "Add Entry")
01203                 $this->add_add_info($res_id);
01204         }

01206 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01217         protected function update_sci_cons($res_id)
01218         {
01219                 $query = "DELETE FROM observatory_to_scientific_contacts WHERE " .
01220                        "observatory_id=" . $res_id;
01221             self::$db->query($query);
01222 
01223                 //PROOF IF THERE IS AN ARRAY!
01224                 if(is_array($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_ids"]))
01225                         foreach ($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_ids"] as $key => $sci_con_id)
01226                         {
01227                                 // check if a name is written in the line
01228                                 if (!empty($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"][$key]))
01229                                 {
01230 
01231                                         $query = "INSERT INTO observatory_to_scientific_contacts VALUES (" . $res_id .
01232                                         "," . $sci_con_id . ")";
01233 
01234                                         self::$db->query($query);
01235                                         if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01236                                                 print "<H4>Error updating observatory_to_scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
01237                                         else
01238                                         {
01239                                                 $query = "UPDATE scientific_contacts SET " .
01240                                                 "name='". addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"][$key]) . "'," .
01241                                                 "email='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_email"][$key]) . "'," .
01242                                                 "institution='" . addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_institution"][$key]) . "' " .
01243                                                 "WHERE id=" . $sci_con_id;
01244 
01245                                                 //SETTING THE POSTVAR TO empty string (for add_sci_cons)
01246                                                 $_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"][$key] = "";
01247 
01248                                                 //DEBUG:
01249 //                                              echo $query;
01250 //                                              nl();
01251 
01252                                                 self::$db->query($query);
01253                                                 if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01254                                                 print "<H4>Error updating scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
01255                                         }
01256                                 }
01257                                 else //DELETE empty row scientific contacts
01258                                 {
01259                                         $query = "DELETE FROM scientific_contacts WHERE id=" . $sci_con_id;
01260                                         self::$db->query($query);
01261                                         if (self::$db->errno() != 0)
01262                                                 print "<H4>Error deleting entry in scientific_contacts!</H4>" . LF;
01263                                 }
01264                         }
01265         }
01266 
01267 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01278         protected function add_sci_cons($res_id)
01279         {
01280                 //echo "DEBUG: SciConCount: " . count($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"]) . LF;
01281             foreach($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"] as $key => $name)
01282                 {
01283                         // check if a name is written in the line
01284                         if (!empty($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"][$key]))
01285                         {
01286                         $query = "INSERT INTO scientific_contacts VALUES (NULL,'" .
01287                        addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_name"][$key]) . "','" .
01288                        addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_email"][$key]) . "','" .
01289                        addslashes($_POST["add_obs_sci_con_institution"][$key]) . "')";
01290 
01291                         //DEBUG:
01292 //                              echo $query;
01293 //                              nl();
01294 
01295                     self::$db->query($query);
01296                             if (self::$db->errno() != 0)

01303                             if (self::$db->errno() != 0)

01427                         }

01431             {

01433                 if(($res_are_id != '') && ($res_are_id != 100000))
01434                 {
01435                         $query = "INSERT INTO observatory_to_research_areas VALUES (" . $res_id .
01436                         "," . $res_are_id . ")";
01437 
01438                         //DEBUG:
01439                         //echo "TESTING: " . $query . "<br>";
01440 
01441                         self::$db->query($query);

01643

01779 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01780 // HELPER METHODS
01785         protected function gpsToFloat($prefix ,$degree, $minutes, $seconds, $cent)
01786         {
01787                 $float = 0.0;
01788 
01789         $float = abs($degree) + abs($minutes / 60) + abs($seconds / (60 * 60)) + abs($cent / (60 * 60 * 100));
01790 
01791                 if ($prefix == 'North')
01792                         $float *= 1;
01793                 else if ($prefix == 'South')
01794                         $float *= -1;
01795                 else if ($prefix == 'East')
01796                         $float *= 1;
01797                 else if ($prefix == 'West')
01798                         $float *= -1;
01801                 //echo "gpsToFloat-DEBUG: " . $prefix . " , " . $degree . LF;
01802                 //echo "Float: " . $float . LF;
01803 
01804         return $float;
01805         }
01806 
01807 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01812         protected function floatToGps($LATorLON, $float)
01813         {
01814                 if($float == NULL)
01815                         $float = 0.0;
01816 
01817                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["float"] = $float;
01818 
01819                 if ($LATorLON == "latitude")
01820                 {
01821                         if($float < 0)
01822                         $prefix = "South";
01823                 else
01824                         $prefix = "North";
01825         }
01826                 else if ($LATorLON == "longitude")
01827                 {
01828                         if($float < 0)
01829                         $prefix = "West";
01830                 else
01831                         $prefix = "East";
01832                 }
01833                 else
01834                 {
01835                         //$_POST["add_obs_" . $LATorLON] = array();
01837                 }
01838 
01839                 //echo "DEBUG-DB-float:" . $float;
01840 
01841         $float = abs($float);
01842         $deg = floor($float);
01843         $min = floor(($float - $deg) * 60);
01844         $sec = floor( ($float - $deg - ($min/60)) * 60 * 60 );
01845         $cent = floor( ($float - $deg - ($min/60) - ($sec/(60 * 60))) * 60 * 60 * 100 );
01846 
01847                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["degree"] = $deg;
01848                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["minutes"] = $min;
01849                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["seconds"] = $sec;
01850                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["cent"] = $cent;
01851                 $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["prefix"] = $prefix;
01852 
01853                 //DEBUG:
01854                 //echo "TESTING: " . $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["degree"] . "<br>";
01855 
01856                 //DEBUG:
01857                 //echo $LATorLON . "-floatToGps()-DEGUG: Float" . $float . LF;
01858                 //echo $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["prefix"] . " , " .  $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["degree"] . " , " . $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["minutes"]  . " , " .
01859                 //     $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["seconds"] . " , " . $this->_fields["obs_$LATorLON"]["cent"] . LF;
01860         }
01861 
01862 }
